00031 namespace votca { namespace tools {

00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00042 class Property {
00043 public:
00044     Property() : _path("") {}
00045     
00046     Property(const string &name, const string &value, const string &path) 
00047         : _name(name), _value(value), _path(path) {}
00048     
00055     Property &add(const string &key, const string &value);
00062     Property &set(const string &key, const string &value);
00063     
00073     Property &get(const string &key);
00074 
00080     bool exists(const string &key);
00081     
00090     std::list<Property *> Select(const string &filter);
00091     
00096     string &value() { return _value; }
00101     string name() { return _name; }
00108     string path() { return _path; }
00109 
00116     template<typename T>
00117     T as() const;
00118 
00123     bool HasChilds() { return !_map.empty(); }
00124 
00126     typedef list<Property>::iterator iterator;
00127     
00129     iterator begin() { return _properties.begin(); }
00131     iterator end() { return _properties.end(); }
00133     list<Property>::size_type size() { return _properties.size(); }
00134 
00135 private:        
00136     map<string,Property*> _map;
00137     list<Property> _properties;
00138     
00139     string _name;
00140     string _value;
00141     string _path;
00142     
00143     static void PrintNode(std::ostream &out, const string &prefix, Property &p);
00144     
00145     friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, Property& p);
00146 };
00147 
00148 inline Property &Property::set(const string &key, const string &value)
00149 {
00150     Property &p = get(key);
00151     p.value() = value;
00152     return p;
00153 }
00154 
00155 inline Property &Property::add(const string &key, const string &value)
00156 {
00157     string path = _path;
00158     if(path != "") path = path + ".";
00159     _properties.push_back(Property(key, value, path + _name ));
00160     _map[key] = &(_properties.back());
00161     return _properties.back();
00162 }
00163 
00164 inline bool Property::exists(const string &key)
00165 {
00166     try { get(key); }
00167     catch(std::exception &err) { return false;}
00168     return true;
00169 }
00170     
00171 bool load_property_from_xml(Property &p, string file);
00172 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, Property& p);

00174 // TO DO: write a better function for this!!!!
00175 template<>
00176 inline bool Property::as<bool>() const
00177 {
00178     if(_value == "true" || _value == "TRUE" || _value == "1") return true;
00179     else return false;
00180 }
00181 
00182 template<typename T>
00183 inline T Property::as() const
00184 {
00185     try {
00186        return boost::lexical_cast<T>(_value);
00187     }
00188     catch(boost::bad_lexical_cast &error ) {
00189         throw std::runtime_error("wrong type in " + _path + "."  + _name + "\n" + error.what());
00190     }
00191 }
00192 
00193 template<>
00194 inline std::string Property::as<std::string>() const
00195 {
00196     string tmp(_value);
00197     boost::trim(tmp);
00198     return tmp;
00199 }
00200 
00201 template<>
00202 inline vec Property::as<vec>() const {
00203     try {
00204         vector<double> tmp;
00205         Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,");
00206         tok.ConvertToVector<double>(tmp);
00207         if (tmp.size() != 3)
00208             throw runtime_error("Vector has " + boost::lexical_cast<string > (tmp.size()) + " instead of three entries");
00209         return vec(tmp[0], tmp[1], tmp[2]);
00210     }    catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &error) {
00211         throw std::runtime_error("wrong type in " + _path + "." + _name + "\n" + error.what());
00212     }
00213 }
00214 
00215 template<>
00216 inline vector<unsigned int> Property::as<vector <unsigned int> >() const {
00217     try {
00218         vector<unsigned int> tmp;
00219         Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,");
00220         tok.ConvertToVector<unsigned int>(tmp);
00221         return tmp;
00222     }    catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &error) {
00223         throw std::runtime_error("wrong type in " + _path + "." + _name + "\n" + error.what());
00224     }
00225 }
00226 
00227 template<>
00228 inline vector<int> Property::as<vector <int> >() const {
00229     try {
00230         vector<int> tmp;
00231         Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,\n\t");
00232         tok.ConvertToVector<int>(tmp);
00233         return tmp;
00234     }    catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &error) {
00235         throw std::runtime_error("wrong type in " + _path + "." + _name + "\n" + error.what());
00236     }
00237 }
00238 
00239 template<>
00240 inline vector<double> Property::as<vector <double> >() const {
00241     try {
00242         vector<double> tmp;
00243         Tokenizer tok(as<string > (), " ,\n\t");
00244         tok.ConvertToVector<double>(tmp);
00245         return tmp;
00246     }    catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &error) {
00247         throw std::runtime_error("wrong type in " + _path + "." + _name + "\n" + error.what());
